thread.title: BRIEF-Ukf (Holdings) Says Perfect Thinking Global To Buy 15.87% Stake In Co For Hk$180.8 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Ukf (Holdings) Says Perfect Thinking Global To Buy 15.87% Stake In Co For Hk$180.8 Mln
text:
Feb 12 (Reuters) - Ukf (Holdings) Ltd:
* UKF (HOLDINGS)-PERFECT THINKING GLOBAL & VENDORS ENTERED SPA, OFFEROR AGREED TO BUY SALE SHARES OF ABOUT 15.87% OF EXISTING ISSUED SHARE CAPITAL OF CO
* ‍TOTAL CASH CONSIDERATION FOR SALE SHARES IS HK$180.8 MILLION EQUIVALENT TO HK$0.25 PER SALE SHARE​
* PERFECT THINKING GLOBAL TO BUY 15.87% STAKE IN CO FOR HK$180.8 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
